docs.text: Welcome to EMEATech EMEATech is a community of people with an interest in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, working in fields relating to technology, including software engineering, machine learning, devops and others. There are already many strong online technology focused communities, but many of these are mainly active in timezones that overlap with the US, and discussion around jobs, culture, etc tends to be US-heavy too. For example, many of these communities advertise jobs, but even the ones advertised as 'fully remote' expect you to overlap with US working hours, or even have US work authorization. EMEA resources news jobs visas and work permits compensation and salary information technology questions and answers EMEA chat-based communities ZATech Slack : A Slack community of around 10k members, mainly technology professionals from South Africa. EMEATech Telegram : A Telegram group for EMEATech. Fill out this short Google Form to join.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: EMEA Salary Resources The Trimodal Nature of Software Engineering Salaries in the Netherlands and Europe - a great blog post about three tiers of companies and how that affects compensation TechPays.eu - an early-stage platform similar to levels.fyi focussed on Europe compensation
